page.title: 03Youlton Hall
page.content: There are large fireplaces in two of the rooms.The owners have recently found a well.The house was once used as a mint and some gold coins were found in the last century.It is believed that James 1st stayed at the Hall on his journeys from Edinburgh to London.The Hall is used as a family farm house with land attached. {FARMING} There are 15 farms in our area and we have visited them all.There are about 2427 acres of farm land.The smallest farm has 18 acres, the largest farm has 380 acres.Most of the farmers in the area work in the village and their farms are small. The Tollerton farmers have small fields mainly.Some have large fields but not many.The large fields are outside the village usually because farmers have removed hedges to
